about_the_game:
A traditional Japanese RPG game created by individuals using RPG maker, with a simple gameplay mechanism and no branching options for linear storylines. There is no brush gameplay, mainly focusing on pairing professions, equipment, etc. to defeat bosses.
If you are a player who likes the old-fashioned RPG on FC, it will be very suitable for this game, such as Dragon Quest, Swallowing Heaven and Earth, etc.
Note that the game pace is very slow in the early stages, and the first battle will only start around 30-60 minutes into the game.
The story tells of a world of swords and magic where the demon god, who maintains order in the demon world, is attacked by several demon kings, causing his strength to weaken. As a result, a large number of monsters freely travel to the human world, bringing more disasters to the already chaotic human world.
On the super giant continent Aquilani, the protagonist suddenly experiences a major upheaval in a relatively peaceful region, embarking on a journey to save the power of the demon god and protect the world.
Although the background is an old-fashioned struggle between good and evil, the plot will be slightly darker.
A very closed world, with only a few specific protagonists controllable, professions can be freely chosen during the upgrade process, and each profession has different characteristics. There is no specialized traditional nanny profession, and the importance of items is very high. Restoring and attacking items require a large amount of inventory. The difficulty is moderate, and many bosses require some skill intelligence or level crushing
The producer is just me personally. If you encounter any problems, please feel free to provide feedback and join the Q group for discussion: 864755651
